nodes.text: Bersabba was a XQ2 Platform used by the Rebel Alliance.

Bersabba was stationed near Abrihom and Cyrlus and was housing Z-95 Headhunters Baker. The Z-95s and the platform were destroyed by TIE Bombers launched from the Nebulon-B frigate Implacable. The events surrounding the platform were recreated and used as a training simulator to train future TIE pilots in the Combat chamber, one of those pilots was Maarek Stele.
